thag5.12:1.1_0: “If a wise one wishes to hold a wise one;
thag5.12:1.2_0: stays with them, their fondness growing;
thag5.12:1.3_0: that astute person is indeed devoted—
thag5.12:2.2_0: one who does not tremble, but reflects instead,
thag5.12:2.3_0: that astute person is indeed strong—
thag5.12:3.2_0: their wisdom is deep, they see the subtle meaning;
thag5.12:3.3_0: that astute person is indeed immovable—
thag5.12:4.1_0: They’re very learned, and have memorized the teaching,
thag5.12:4.2_0: living in line with the teachings—
thag5.12:4.3_0: that astute person is indeed such—
thag5.12:5.1_0: They know the meaning of what is said,
thag5.12:5.3_0: that astute person is indeed a master of meaning—
thag5.12:5.7_0: The Book of the Fives is finished.
thag5.12:6.0_0: The account of the thirty-six streams
thag5.12:6.4_0: as a farmer plough she has raped.
thag5.12:7.1_0: Yasoja, overcome by fame and sovereignty,
